entry.tran: 冷冻剂;冷却液;散热剂;制冷剂
entry.def: Coolant is a liquid used to keep a machine or engine cool while it is operating.

means.word_mean: 1. a fluid agent (gas or liquid) that produces cooling; especially one used to cool a system by transfering heat away from one part to another;

sentences.sentence: "he added more coolant to the car's radiator"
"the atomic reactor used a gas coolant"
"lathe operators use an emulsion of oil and water as a coolant for the cutting tool"
